head.title: MediaModule (WSO2 Mashup Server Host Objects API)

html.body: org.wso2.mashup.hostobjects.feed Class MediaModule java.lang.Object org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject org.wso2.mashup.hostobjects.feed.MediaModule All Implemented Interfaces: java.io.Serializable, org.mozilla.javascript.ConstProperties, org.mozilla.javascript.debug.DebuggableObject, org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable public class MediaModule extends org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject This module allows the addition of Media Content to an Entry ex: //Creating a Feed var mashupFeed = new Feed(); mashupFeed.feedType = "rss_2.0"; mashupFeed.title = "EarthShots.org"; mashupFeed.description = "Photos from EarthShots.org"; mashupFeed.link = "http://www.earthshots.org"; //Creating an Entry for the Feed var newEntry = new Entry(); newEntry.title = "Capitol Peak Evening by Tad Bowman"; newEntry.link = "http://www.earthshots.org/2007/10/capitol-peak-evening-by-tad-bowman/"; newEntry.description = ""; //Creating a Media module to be added to the Entry var mediaModule = new MediaModule("http://www.earthshots.org/photos/387.jpg"); mediaModule.copyright = "2007 Tad Bowman"; mediaModule.type = "image/jpeg"; mediaModule.thumbnail = "http://www.earthshots.org/photos/387.thumb.jpg"; //Adding the Media Module to the Entry newEntry.addMediaModule(mediaModule); //Adding the Entry to the Feed mashupFeed.insertEntry(newEntry); See notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait   Constructor Detail MediaModule public MediaModule() Method Detail jsConstructor public static org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable jsConstructor(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx, java.lang.Object[] args, org.mozilla.javascript.Function ctorObj, boolean inNewExpr) throws org.wso2.mashup.MashupFault Parameters: args - A string reprepsentation of the media object URI is mandatory Throws: org.wso2.mashup.MashupFault getClassName public java.lang.String getClassName() Specified by: getClassName in interface org.mozilla.javascript.Scriptable Specified by: getClassName in class org.mozilla.javascript.ScriptableObject jsSet_copyright public void jsSet_copyright(java.lang.String copyRight) Copyright information for media object. Parameters: copyRight - copyright information as a String jsGet_copyright public java.lang.Object jsGet_copyright() Copyright information for media object. Returns: copyright information as a String jsSet_type public void jsSet_type(java.lang.String type) type is the standard MIME type of the object. It is an optional attribute. Parameters: type - as String jsGet_type public java.lang.Object jsGet_type() type is the standard MIME type of the object. It is an optional attribute. Returns: type as String jsSet_thumbnail public void jsSet_thumbnail(java.lang.String uri) throws org.wso2.mashup.MashupFault Allows particular images to be used as representative images for the media object. If multiple thumbnails are included, it is assumed that the images are in order of importance. Parameters: uri - as String Throws: org.wso2.mashup.MashupFault - if the given URI is malformed jsGet_thumbnail public java.lang.String[] jsGet_thumbnail() Allows particular images to be used as representative images for the media object. If multiple thumbnails are included, it is assumed that the images are in order of importance. Returns: a String array of thumbnail URIs jsSet_fileSize public void jsSet_fileSize(java.lang.Long fileSize) fileSize is the number of bytes of the media object. Parameters: fileSize - in Bytes jsGet_fileSize public java.lang.Long jsGet_fileSize() fileSize is the number of bytes of the media object. Returns: the size of the file in bytes jsSet_height public void jsSet_height(java.lang.Integer height) Parameters: height - is the height of the media object as an Integer. jdGet_height public java.lang.Integer jdGet_height() Returns: the height of the media object as an Integer. jsSet_width public void jsSet_width(java.lang.Integer width) width is the width of the media object. It is an optional attribute. jsGet_width public java.lang.Integer jsGet_width() width is the width of the media object. It is an optional attribute. jsSet_description public void jsSet_description(java.lang.String desc) Short description describing the media object typically a sentence in length. Parameters: desc - as String jsGet_description public java.lang.String jsGet_description() Short description describing the media object typically a sentence in length. Returns: description as String jsSet_language public void jsSet_language(java.lang.String lang) lang is the primary language encapsulated in the media object. Language codes possible are detailed in RFC 3066. This attribute is used similar to the xml:lang attribute detailed in the XML 1.0 Specification (Third Edition). Parameters: lang - as String jsGet_language public java.lang.String jsGet_language() lang is the primary language encapsulated in the media object. Language codes possible are detailed in RFC 3066. This attribute is used similar to the xml:lang attribute detailed in the XML 1.0 Specification (Third Edition). Returns: language as String jsSet_bitrate public void jsSet_bitrate(java.lang.Float rate) bitrate is the kilobits per second rate of media. Parameters: rate - as Float jsGet_bitrate public java.lang.Float jsGet_bitrate() bitrate is the kilobits per second rate of media. Returns: bitrate as Float jsSet_framerate public void jsSet_framerate(java.lang.Float rate) framerate is the number of frames per second for the media object. Parameters: rate - as Float jsGet_framerate public java.lang.Float jsGet_framerate() framerate is the number of frames per second for the media object. Returns: framerate as Float jsSet_samplingrate public void jsSet_samplingrate(java.lang.Float rate) samplingrate is the number of samples per second taken to create the media object. It is expressed in thousands of samples per second (kHz). Parameters: rate - as Float jsGet_samplingrate public java.lang.Float jsGet_samplingrate() samplingrate is the number of samples per second taken to create the media object. It is expressed in thousands of samples per second (kHz). Returns: samplingrate as Float jsSet_channels public void jsSet_channels(java.lang.Integer channles) channels is number of audio channels in the media object. Parameters: channles - as Integer jsGet_channels public java.lang.Integer jsGet_channels() channels is number of audio channels in the media object. Returns: The number of channles as Integer jsSet_duration public void jsSet_duration(java.lang.Long duration) duration is the number of seconds the media object plays. Parameters: duration - jsGet_duration public java.lang.Long jsGet_duration() duration is the number of seconds the media object plays. Returns: duration as Long
